author: cframpton
msg: Return a copy because when the source of the data changes we destroy the bitmap.  If a developer is holding a reference to the actual bitmap they will have an invalid reference.

author: cframpton
msg: Added styles to correspond to 4 new text layout formats in TLF3 (containerBreakBefore/After, columnBreakBefore/After).  These should have gone in with the TLF3 integration.

author: cframpton
msg: The labelDisplay var in ItemRenderer is now Bindable.  [SDK-31019].

author: cframpton
msg: Fix event dispatcher being removed from the wrong skin part in partRemoved().  [SDK-29012]

author: cframpton
msg: spark.components.TextInput with displayAsPassword = true will now return a string masked by asterisks instead of the actual value through MSAA. [SDK-31271]
